title: Generalization vs Accuracy
text: Generalization is poor, but training accuracy is perfect.

title: Important Differences between the graphs
text: An overfitted model follows the training data very closely but would likely miss new points that fall along the general trend.

title: Pay attention to:
text: Look for the graph where the line tries to pass through almost every single blue dot, even if it means making sharp, 'wiggly' turns. üêç
